title: The Kite Runner
author: Khaled Hosseini
description: A powerful story of friendship, redemption, and the haunting price of betrayal set against the backdrop of Afghanistan's tumultuous recent history.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A gripping, heart-wrenching, and wholly remarkable tale of coming-of-age in a South poisoned by virulent prejudice.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel that follows the life of Winston Smith, a low-ranking member of 'the Party'.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A classic American novel about the Jazz Age, exploring themes of decadence, idealism, and excess.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: Set in the distant future amidst a feudal interstellar society, this epic science fiction novel tells the story of young Paul Atreides.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who refuses to speak after allegedly murdering her husband.

title: The Da Vinci Code
author: Dan Brown
description: A mystery thriller that follows symbologist Robert Langdon as he investigates a murder in the Louvre Museum.

title: A Game of Thrones
author: George R.R. Martin
description: The first book in the epic fantasy series A Song of Ice and Fire, set in the fictional Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.

title: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: An epic high fantasy adventure following the quest to destroy the One Ring and defeat the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a survivalist family and eventually earns a PhD from Cambridge University.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: A psychological thriller about a husband who becomes the prime suspect in his wife's disappearance.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A coming-of-age murder mystery set in the marshlands of North Carolina in the 1950s and 1960s.
